description.en:
BTA Protocol is a knowledge economy unlocking blockchain education and opportunities of decentralized finance while contributing to charities. 

With every transaction of BTAP token, there is a tax of 1% of the amount being sent.

0.5% goes to all token holders.
0.25 % will be burned and be taken out of circulation until 50
million token supply at which point 0.25% will be bolted on to the 0.5%
going to token holders.
0.25 % will go to the Beacon wallet, which is our charity wallet with an initial base value of 10 million tokens.
